name: Megapede
description: The Megapede is a large, segmented creature capable of grappling foes and delivering toxic stings. It has many legs and a menacing stinger.
memorable: Its ability to sense and consume metal makes it particularly dangerous to armored foes.
goals: Typically seeks to grapple enemies and consume metal objects.
relations: Can be encountered with other scavenger creatures or in areas rich with metal.
environment: Typically found in caves or ruins with metal and debris.
strengths: Its Metal Sense allows it to detect metal from great distances, making it a strategic hunter.
weaknesses: Low intelligence and social skills, making it vulnerable to manipulation tactics.
attacks: Bite attack that deals slashing and acid damage, and a stinger attack that poisons foes.
most_powerful_ability: Acid Spray that can damage multiple creatures in a line.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 60 feet, allowing it to detect nearby threats without sight.
skills: Has low passive Perception, making it less aware of subtle danger.
additional_information: Can grapple foes and deal extra damage to them.
Acid immunity provides a defensive edge.
Multiattack option enables it to strike multiple times in a turn.
Consumes metal objects for strategic advantage.
Poisoned enemies suffer reduced combat effectiveness.
test_queries: large venomous creature that senses metal
monstrosity with poisonous stinger and acid spray
segment monster that grapples and eats metal
metal-sensitive creature with strong bite attack
skirmisher that deals acid damage and can poison
